PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ActuatorTypeRotationalActuation
PropertySetDef.Definition: Characteristics of rotational actuation of an actuator History: Replaces Pset_RotationalActuator

PropertyDef.Name: Torque
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the maximum close-off torque for the actuator.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: アクチュエータの最大締め切りトルクを示す。

PropertyDef.Name: RangeAngle
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the maximum rotation the actuator must traverse.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: アクチュエータが動く最大回転角を示す。

PsetDefinitionAliases.PsetDefinitionAlias: アクチュエータの回転動作の特性。
